Player History
Drafted in 4th round, 99th overall pick, by Oakland in 2010...
Traded from Oakland to Los Angeles (A) on 2/4/2012 (Going to OAK: P N. Mutz. Going to LAA: 3B K. Vitek)...
Traded from Los Angeles (A) to Minnesota on 2/8/2013 (Going to MIN: RF J. Winker, C M. Perez, 3B K. Vitek, C J. Romero. Going to LAA: 3B P. Sandoval)...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/9/2013, off Jason Anderson (SEA)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/29/2013, off Michael Kirkman (TOR)...
Traded from Minnesota to Washington on 2/4/2014 (Going to MIN: P S. Marshall, P J. Pineiro, SS J. Rollins. Going to WSH: 3B K. Vitek, 3B K. Cowart)...
Drove in 7 runs against Arizona on 9/20/2016...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/13/2018, hitting .440 with 3 HR, 8 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Houston on 9/19/2018...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Chicago (A) on 7/12/2019...
Injured on 6/24/2020 with a Strained Thigh Muscle, out for one week...
Drove in 6 runs against Atlanta on 7/28/2020...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/29/2020, hitting .478 with 2 HR, 7 RBI...
Traded from Washington to Oakland on 7/17/2023 (Going to OAK: 1B K. Vitek. Going to WSH: 2B S. Ornelas)...
Drove in 7 runs against Texas on 9/16/2023...
Drove in 6 runs against Chicago (A) on 9/30/2023...
Won Player of the Week award on 10/2/2023, hitting .524 with 2 HR, 9 RBI...
Won World Championship with Oakland in 2023...
Signed as a free agent by Washington on 2/9/2024 to a 2-year deal worth $3,333,333 per year...
Had 5 hits with 5 RBI against Philadelphia on 6/21/2024...
Was selected to the 2024 Allstar game...
